entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,727Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 86

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: You're beautiful in my eyes
entry.summary:
Author: TheEndIsNeverTheEnd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,653Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Gotham is a city filled with crime, garbage, hatred, and murder. A clear class difference from the rich and poor, and the obvious hold angry men in costumes has over the city. Yet with everything wrong with it, there you are in love with it. You're a painter. (Not the smartest career choice) But its the thing that keeps you going in life. It's You're one true love. What inspired you to do crazy things.Like seriously crazy things.For example, inviting clayface to your studio to paint him.You swear You're not insane!!!

entry.summary:
Author: scleraphone

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,748Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 116

Summary: Somewhere along the line, someone had told you that if you worked hard and honest, you could make a difference in people's lives. What you didn't expect was how quickly you'd be pulled into the undertow.

entry.title: Just Say the Word
entry.summary:
Author: SuperCerulean

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,890Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Following the events of One and Only, Jason Todd's life is spiralling out of control. His best friend is dead, his family thinks he's on the verge of a meltdown, and the one person who might understand is locked up in Arkham and hates his guts. Knowing he's getting to a point where things are going to overwhelm him, he can either let himself react the way he reacts, or he can do something drastic to try and prevent the next Arkham Knight situation. Which one do you think he goes with?

entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,082Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 132

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting. At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns. No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.
